subject: Australian Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Kim Clijsters, the champion on the way out, beat Martina Hingis, the champion on the way back, and will now face Maria Sharapova in the semifinals of the Australian Open.
snippet: Kim Clijsters, the champion on the way out, beat Martina Hingis, the champion on the way back, and will now face Maria Sharapova in the semifinals of the Australian Open.
